Interface MediaPlayerView.MediaPlayerViewListener

All Superinterfaces:
ViewService.ViewServiceListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
MediaPlayerController
Enclosing class:
MediaPlayerView
public static interface MediaPlayerView.MediaPlayerViewListener extends ViewService.ViewServiceListener
Listener interface for handling user actions from the media player view.
